descriptions.short: Automatically applies Items on different triggers
descriptions.disclaimer:
For the time being, this mode does not requrie the items in your inventory to get the buffs.
Functionality for that (as well as using the items from your inventory) might come later.
descriptions.key:
For each item in the 'Off' state: do nothing
For each item in the 'OnSpawn' state: Apply the buff a single time at the start of the hunt (or on death/respawn)
For each item in the 'StartOfCombat' state: Apply the buff at the start of combat'.
For each item in the 'Always' state: apply the buffs constantly (cheating)
descriptions.debug: Debug Info (send a screenshot of this info along with the bug report)
descriptions.jsonWarning: WARNING: JSON utils not available (your REFramework version may be outdated). Configuration will not be saved between restarts.
